import React, { useState } from 'react'; //import './LandingPage.css'; // Import your styles for LandingPage const LandingPage = () => { const [isLoginActive, setIsLoginActive] = useState(true); // Default to show Login form const handleSwitchForm = () => { setIsLoginActive(!isLoginActive); // Toggle between Login and Signup form }; return (

{isLoginActive ? "Login" : "Sign Up"}

{isLoginActive ? (
Please, enter your email and password for login.
) : (
Please, enter your email, password and password confirmation for sign up.
)}
); }; export default LandingPage;
